00041   public function editmap($mapno=-1)
00042   {
00043     /* If no map number is specified on the command line, and
00044      * no post data has been sent, we display a blank form to create a new map.
00045      * If a map number is specified on the command line, we display a form
00046      * populated with the data for the pre-existing map 'mapno'.
00047      * If post data is present, the user has submitted the form after editing
00048      * the map specification, so we add it to the edit queue.
00049      */
00050     $this->load->view('header_view');
00051 
00052  
00053 
00054     if (!$this->input->post('submit'))
00055       {
00056         if ($mapno==-1) {
00057           // create new map
00058           $data = $this->map_model->get_default_map();
00059         } else {
00060           $data = $this->map_model->get_map($mapno);
00061         }
00062       }
00063     else
00064       {
00065         //$uname  = $this->input->post('uname');
00066         //$passwd = $this->input->post('passwd');
00067         //echo "validate_login: uname=".$uname." passwd=".$passwd.".";
00068         // update mapdata in database and add it to queue.
00069       }
00070     $this->load->view('footer_view');
00071  
00072 
00073     //echo 'editmap.  mapno='.$mapno;
00074   }

00271                 $bbox_sw_lng = $bbox_sw->lng;
